discourse_list.title: Know Your MIP #14 | CoinShares Treasury Investment Program

content.content: Know Your MIP #14 | MIP86: CoinShares Treasury Investment Program       For this series’ 14th session, we will host the team from CoinShares @CoinSharesCo to take a deep-dive into MIP86 – CoinShares’ Treasury Investment Program. @Recognized-Delegates & the Maker Community are invited to join this discussion to explore how the CoinShares MIP compares and contrasts the other opportunities to leverage the PSM for revenue.  If you can’t make this call, post any questions you may have for our guests on this forum post, and our host will ask them during the Q&A. Slides presented in the call can be found here.  We will host…  CoinShares CEO - Jean-Marie Mognetti  CoinShares CFO - Richard Nash    Join us! @Retro  will host.  Agenda:  MIP86 Presentation by the CoinShares Team Open Community Q&A   When Time in your local-timezone format: 2022-10-18T17:30:00Z Mark it on your Google Calendar!  Where CrowdCast Call   crowdcast    Know Your MIP #14 | MIP86: CoinShares Treasury Investment Program Register now for Know Your MIP #14 | MIP86: CoinShares Treasury Investment Program on crowdcast, scheduled to go live on October 18, 2022, 12:30 PM CDT.      Attn: @Core-Facilitators @Recognized-Delegates @GovAlpha-Core-Unit @strat-fin-core-unit @Risk-Core-Unit @collateral-core-unit @SES-Core-Unit

Know Your MIP #14 - Editorial October 18th, 2022  Agenda   00:00: Intro with Retro  01:03: Presentation with CoinShares  13:34: Questions  48:58: Outro   Video https://youtu.be/2rTpyLEq6yg  Introduction  Retro  Hello, MakerDAO community. Welcome to Know Your MIP episode #14. I am Retro from the SES CU. Today I am joined by CEO and CFO from CoinShares, Jean-Marie Mognetti and Richard Nash, to dive deeply into MIP86.   Presentation  CoinShares Treasury Investment Program 01:03  CoinShares for MakerDAO1271×816 40.8 KB   CEO & Co-founder, and CFO1503×888 135 KB   CoinShares is Europe's leading full-service digital asset investment and trading group, we are a public listed company.1513×890 171 KB   CoinShares, a unique crypto company exhibiting consistent growth in Revenue and Adjusted EBITDA since 2016.1514×875 164 KB   CoinShares' financials (in millions GBP)1512×887 67.2 KB   CoinShares' Capital Markets activity1517×877 213 KB   CoinShares x MakerDAO1513×864 140 KB   Our Proposal (1/2)1491×878 260 KB   Our Proposal (2/2)1506×889 167 KB   Comparison of MIPs for the USDC PSM Vault1501×896 161 KB   Framework1510×888 257 KB   Proposed revenue model1487×870 81.9 KB   Alternative revenue model proposed by MIP65, MIP811459×864 75.3 KB   Summary of our MIP1473×863 172 KB   Questions 13:34 - PaperImperium: Is there a maximum concentration for a given counterparty or issuance 14:04 - David Krett: Your proposal states that a minimum of 70% will be investment grade - could you talk about the credit risks of the non-investment grade investments? 18:29 - Retro: You mentioned transparency, and there was also a call out for a real-time TrustExplorer. Could you speak to that? 22:00 - Retro: Knowing that it is a partnership that CoinShares and Mourinho have directly, would you say that request by the DAO could be integrated since you own some of that development? 32:12 - Tim Black: Do you have the smart contract developers for this in-house? 32:55 - Retro: Could you speak of the sub-components 6 and 7, the legal structure, and the custodian relationship? 36:03 - ElPro: Is the Armanino a real-time tick-by-tick dashboard–or does it get or priced EoD? Second, can you expand on SOFR? 38:23 - ElPro: Can you go over the slow allocation of funds–is it because you are worried about the possibility of a recession in 2023?  40:00 - Retro: Can you speak to the sub-component four of your MIP? 42:30 - ElPro: Can you go over the breakdown on $500M and the 1/3, 1/3, 1/3 split? 47:00 - Retro: What is the best way to get a hold of you? 48:21 - Retro: Any last comment?]  Outro  Retro 48:58  Thank you for coming. Keep up with everything at the forum, and see you around.   Credits  Kunfu-po produced this summary. Everyone who spoke and presented on the call.

Kunfu-po:   Comparison of MIPs for the USDC PSM Vault1501×896 161 KB   The variable rate could be a good complement to our forecasted (if MIPs passed) asset deployment program. It might be a while until rates come back down but when it does, historically it has dropped drastically back to close to 0%. Not sure if coinshares would be open to this, but a floor of 0.50% or even 1.00% would make this MIP more attractive. As the chart below shows, historically rates have taken 1.5 - 3.2 years to peak but the drops have been much quicker and the past two have gone all the way down to 0%.
